short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exclude specific sites from your browsing history and block ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take full control of your browsing experience with our powerful and user-friendly extension. Easily exclude specific websites from being saved in your browsing history, ensuring that your activity remains private and your history stays clean and organized. 

In addition, enjoy a smoother and more focused browsing session by blocking intrusive ads that disrupt your workflow. 

Whether youâ€™re managing sensitive searches or simply streamlining your online experience, this extension provides the tools you need for a clutter-free, private, and distraction-free web journey.
